entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the three main characters in the story. She is mentioned as saying 'the Cloak' and arguing with Ron about the wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the three main characters in the story. He is mentioned as saying 'the wand' and arguing with Hermione about the Cloak.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the three main characters in the story. He is mentioned as saying 'the stone' and defending the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object that has helped Harry, Ron, and Hermione a lot in their adventures. It is mentioned as being already possessed by them.

entities.name: unbeatable wand
entities.description: The unbeatable wand is an object that Ron is trying to convince Hermione to get. He claims it would be bound to attract trouble if used carelessly.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione are arguing about the Cloak and the wand.
Harry is defending the Invisibility Cloak, which they already possess.
Ron wants to get the unbeatable wand and convince Hermione to join him.
